com.engineersbox.httpproxy.connection.threading

Class PoolManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engineersbox.httpproxy.connection.threading.PoolManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreadManager

    public class PoolManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThreadManager
    Thead pool manager, using two independent ThreadPoolExecutor's configured via Config.
